pack.tacz.tacz_default_gun.name: Pacote Padrão TAC Zero
pack.tacz.tacz_default_gun.desc: Que esta nação, sob Deus, terá um novo nascimento de liberdade, e aquele governo do povo, pelo povo, para o povo, jamais desapareça da face da Terra.

tacz.gun.ak47.desc: From jungles to bays, it's always present.
tacz.gun.cz75.desc: No limit of shots taken to hit the target.
tacz.gun.db_long.desc: You can use words and money to solve the problem. Or, just bring it to the table.
tacz.gun.db_short.desc: Although it's not the right size, it gets the job done.
tacz.gun.deagle.desc: It can destroy anything just like your wrists.
tacz.gun.hk_g3.desc: The other arm of the free world.
tacz.gun.hk_mp5a5.desc: Just like petting a purring cat.
tacz.gun.m16a1.desc: This is my rifle. There are many like it, but this one is mine.
tacz.gun.m95.desc: Listen to the whistle of the authority.
tacz.gun.m249.desc: Cut anything down in your way.
tacz.gun.rpg7.desc: There's nothing the RPG can't deal... except one more shot!
tacz.gun.scar_h.desc: The only bad thing for expensive things, is the expense.
tacz.gun.sks_tactical.desc: Collectors love to see their favorites reborn in the modern age, and this is no exception.
tacz.gun.ump45.desc: Its flat design makes the enemy's lifeline also flat.
tacz.gun.vector45.desc: It is fast, but a bit too fast.
